title: How many iPhones will Apple launch on October 12, 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: It is speculated that Apple will launch 4 devices on Oct 13, 2020 via their online event called “Hi Speed”. The smallest one will be available with a 5.4″ display and the largest one will be available with a 6.7″ display. All 4 devices should come with OLED display screens, but the 6.1″ Pro and 6.7″ Pro Max should also have Super Retina displays. Both high end devices are likely to come with 512GB storage and both the low end devices should start from 64GB going up to 256GB. The 2 low end devices are likely to have multiple color options but the 2 high-end devices may not have as many color options. Except the date of the event, everything else is speculative and we will know only after launch.
Two iPhone Pro and Two simple ones This year's line will be iPhone 12 mini iPhone 12 plus or max. iPhone 12 pro iPhone Pro max
